question: A, B and C together can complete a piece of work in 30 minutes. A and B together can complete the same work in 50 minutes. C alone can complete the work in :
explanation:
Work done by (A + B + C) in 1 minute $latex = \\frac{1}{30}&s=1$
Work done by (A + B) in 1 minute $latex = \\frac{1}{50}&s=1$
∴ Work done by C alone 1 minute $latex = \\frac{1}{30}-\\frac{1}{50}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{5-3}{150} = \\frac{2}{150} = \\frac{1}{75}&s=1$
∴ C alone will complete the work in 75 minutes. 
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
